item.title: Useful tools
item.description: I’m transferring my website over to Hugo so this list is from my original website, with a few added extras whenver I remember to update it. Productivity Pomofocus - Simple Pomodoro timer for breaking down tasks. Countdowns (iOS) - I like to put nice calendar events (holidays, gigs, etc) in here to remind me what I’ve got to look forward to. Boring Calendar/Reminders - Because I also need to remember when I’ve got meetings/no toothpaste left.

item.title: My humble home-lab
item.description: Intro I’ve been tinkering with secondary computers since I got a Pi 3B for my birthday in 2016, but didn’t really use it for what I imagined a server to be, outside of installing Pi-hole to do DNS-level ad blocking. I wasn’t that interested in the GPIO capabilities outside of a university project, and wanted something more powerful to play with. Enter, the HP ProDesk! I found this back in February, and aside from looking like it was pulled from a school computer lab, it checked all my boxes:
